pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, January 18, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, January 18, 2016:

St. Andrews by-the-Sea

The Prime Minister will be in private Cabinet meetings throughout the day.

1:35 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability

Van Horne Ballroom
The Algonquin Resort
184 Adolphus Street
St. Andrews by-the-Sea, NB

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 1:15 p.m.

6:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a community dinner.

WC Oâ€™Neill Arena Complex
24 Reed Street
St. Andrews by-the-Sea, NB

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 6:15 p.m

Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
